description: Primes whose reversal is a fifth power.
links: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..6346
mathematica: Do[ If[ PrimeQ[ n ] && IntegerQ[ ToExpression[ StringReverse[ ToString[ n ] ] ]^(1/5) ], Print[ n ] ], {n, 1, 10^16} ]
prog: (Python)from sympy import isprimeA059000_list = []for i in range(3*10**5):    j = i**5    p = int(str(j)[::-1])    if j % 10 and isprime(p):        A059000_list.append(p)A059000_list = sorted(A059000_list) # _Chai Wah Wu_, Dec 20 2015
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 16 2001
